page.title: 06THE SHOP IN ABERNYTE
page.content: There is a V.G. store in Abernyte Village.Which acts as Baker,Newsagent, Grocer,Butcher,Tobacconist,Chemist, Ironmonger,Greengrocer and Confection- ers.The shop has been at the Old Smid- dy since 1958.Before that it was at North Pitkindie.The owner works there, and has 1 fulltime and 1 parttime help Opening hours are Mon-Fri 7.00-11.45 12.45-4.00 Sat 9.00-11.45.The shop is at the southern end of the building the store is in the middle and the owner lives at the northen end.In the shop there is counter,freeze fridge, bacon machine,scales and a till.You can get about 6 people the shop. There is a small counter in the middle of the shop.At one end it has sweets and a till at the other end it has a space.The assisant stands behind the counter to serve you.Behind the conter are shelves and a wine rack.
